headings.usage: Use for H1-H3. H1 should be massive (text-6xl+).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, UI labels, and data.

mono.usage: Use for code snippets, pricing numbers, and technical data.

gradients.text_gradient: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-400 via-purple-500 to-pink-500

buttons.primary: bg-purple-600 hover:bg-purple-500 text-white font-semibold py-3 px-8 rounded-full shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(139,92,246,0.5)] transition-all hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(139,92,246,0.7)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-purple-500/50 text-purple-300 hover:bg-purple-500/10 hover:border-purple-400 hover:text-white py-3 px-8 rounded-full transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg transition-colors

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-slate-900/50 border border-white/10 p-8 hover:border-purple-500/50 transition-all duration-500
cards.course: rounded-xl overflow-hidden bg-slate-900 border border-white/10 group hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-purple-900/20 transition-all
cards.stat: p-6 rounded-xl bg-slate-900/60 border border-white/5 backdrop-blur-md

inputs.default: bg-slate-950/50 border border-slate-800 text-slate-200 focus:border-purple-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-purple-500 rounded-lg py-3 px-4 w-full transition-all placeholder:text-slate-600

hero.usage: Main landing page hero background with overlay

general: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings to give a modern tech feel.
Implement the 'Glassmorphism' effect using the provided Tailwind classes for all cards and modals.
Use the 'Neon Glow' shadow effects for primary actions to drive conversion.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark backgrounds (Aim for WCAG AA).
Use framer-motion for smooth entrance animations on all pages.
theme_setup: Set the default theme to 'dark' in the tailwind config and state management.
Ensure the background is always a deep slate/black, never pure black (#000000) unless for specific high-contrast sections.

components.CourseCard: Use the glassmorphism style. Image on top (aspect video), title in Outfit font, glow on hover.
components.HeroSection: Use the provided abstract neon image as a background with a heavy dark overlay (bg-slate-900/80) so text pops.
components.Sidebar: For the student/admin dashboard, use a glass sidebar with a backdrop-blur effect.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ðŸ’¡ðŸ”®ðŸŽ¯ðŸ“šðŸŽ­ðŸŽ¬ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a 'data-testid' attribute to facilitate robust automated testing.
